price: Kuma lalle ne haƙĩƙa Mun sãdar* da magana sabõda su, tsammãninsu, suna tunãni.
arabic: ۞ وَلَقَدۡ وَصَّلۡنَا لَهُمُ ٱلۡقَوۡلَ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ
footnotes: * Attaura da Alƙur'ãni. Ayyukan Annabawa sãshen Su sun sãdu da sãshe.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaqad waṣṣalnā lahumu al-qawla laʿallahum yatadhakkarūna
